publishing_focus.primary_focus: Historical and contemporary military strategy, tactical analysis, evolution of warfare technology
publishing_focus.target_audience: Students and teachers of military history, strategy game enthusiasts, military strategy professionals
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Focuses on the intellectual aspect of warfare, including the evolution of strategy, providing a fresh perspective in the genre
publishing_focus.example_titles: Book series on the evolution of military strategy, in-depth analyses of ancient warfare tactics
